title: Sakura Anata Ni Deaete Yokatta
lyrics: Intro:  Sakura sakura aitai yo iya da kimi ni ima sugu aitai yo' Daijoubu mou nakanai de Watashi wa kaze anata wo tsunde iru yo ' Sakura sakura aitai yo iya da Kimi ni ima sugu aitai yo' Arigatou zutto daisuki Watashi wa hoshi anata wo mimamori tsudzukeru Anata ni deae te yokatta honto u ni honto u ni yokatta Koko ni mou ire naku nacchat ta Mou ika naku cha honto gomen ne Watashi wa mou hitori de tooi tokoro ni ika naku cha do ko e "tte kika nai de nande" tte kika nai de honto go men ne Watashi wa mou anata no soba ni irare naku natta no Itsumo no sanpomichi sakura namiki wo nukete yuki Yoku asonda kawamo no ue no sora no hikaru hou e to Mou ae naku naru kedo sabishii kedo heiki da yo Umarete yokatta honto yo katta Anata ni deatte yokatta
